description: The system up notification shall be sent when the AP
is fully up and running.

event.Summary: AP is fully up and running

description: The system down notification shall be sent before the AP
is about to reboot.

event.Summary: AP is about to reboot

description: The RADIUS server changed notification shall be sent when
the RADIUS server has changed from Primary / Secondary to
Secondary / Primary.

event.Summary: The RADIUS server has changed from Primary / Secondary to Secondary / Primary

description: The associate notification shall be sent when a station successfully
associates with the Access Point. The value of the notification shall
include the MAC address of the station that has associated.

event.Summary: Station $v1 is successfully associated with the access point

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The re-associate notification shall be sent when a station
successfully re-associates with the Access Point. The value of the
notification shall include the MAC address of the station
that has associated.

event.Summary: Station $v1 is successfully re-associated with the access point

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The authentication notification shall be sent when a station
successfully authenticates with the Access Point. The value of the
notification shall include the MAC address of the station
that has authenticated.

event.Summary: Station $v1 is successfully authenticated with the access point

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The station request fail shall be sent out when a station
fails to associate / re-associate / authenticate with the
Access Point. The notification shall include the MAC address
of the station and the reason code for the failure.

event.Summary: Station $v1 with $v2 request has failed with the access point: $v3

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: This attribute defines the request type sent by the station.
Value = 1: Unknown request type
Value = 2: Association Request
Value = 3: Re-association Request
Value = 4: Authentication
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11RequestType

description: This attribute defines the reason for the failure of an operation.
Value = 1: Invalid mode/state
Value = 2: Station not authenticated.
Value = 3: Internal error
Value = 4: Out of sequence frame
Value = 5: Un-supported algorithm
Value = 6: Invalid frame length
Value = 7: WEP is required on the AP
Value = 8: WEP not allowed
Value = 9: Challenge text mismatch
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11ReasonCode

description: The 802.1X MAC address authentication success notification shall
be sent when a station successfully authenticates the MAC address
with the RADIUS server. The value of the notification shall
include the MAC address of the station that has authenticated.

event.Summary: Station $v1 is successfully authenticated the MAC address with the RADIUS server

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The 802.1X MAC address authentication failure notification shall
be sent when a station fails to authenticate the MAC address
with the RADIUS server. The value of the notification shall
include the MAC address of the station that failed to authenticate.

event.Summary: Station $v1 has failed to authenticate the MAC address with the RADIUS server

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The 802.1X authentication not initiated notification shall
be sent when a station did not initiate 802.1X authentication
with the RADIUS server. The value of the notification shall
include the MAC address of the station that did not initiate
802.1X authentication.

event.Summary: Station $v1 has not initiated 802.1X authentication with the RADIUS server

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The 802.1X authentication success notification shall
be sent when a station successfully authenticates with the
RADIUS server. The value of the notification shall include
the MAC address of the station that has authenticated.

event.Summary: Station $v1 is successfully authenticated with the RADIUS server

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The 802.1X authentication failure notification shall
be sent when a station fails to authenticate with the
RADIUS server. The value of the notification shall include
the MAC address of the station that failed to authenticate.

event.Summary: Station $v1 has failed to authenticate with the RADIUS server

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The Local MAC address authentication success notification shall
be sent when a station successfully authenticates the MAC address
with the database stored locally within the AP. The value of the
notification shall include the MAC address of the station that
has authenticated.

event.Summary: Station $v1 has successfully authenticated the MAC address with the database stored locally within the AP

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The Local MAC address authentication failure notification shall
be sent when a station fails to authenticate the MAC address
with the database stored locally within the AP. The value of the
notification shall include the MAC address of the station that
has authenticated.

event.Summary: Station $v1 has failed to authenticate the MAC address with the database stored locally within the AP

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: The PPP Logon failure notification shall be sent out when
the AP fails to login successfully to the PPP peer using the
supplied username and password.

event.Summary: AP failed to login to the PPP peer using the supplied username and password

description: The IAPP Station Roamed-From Notification shall be sent out
whenever a station roams from another Access Point (AP) to
this AP. The notification shall include the MAC address of
the station and the IP address of the old AP.

event.Summary: Station $v1 has roamed from $v2 access point to this access point

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: This value indicates the IP address of the Access Point
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11IpAddress

description: The IAPP Station Roamed-To Notification shall be sent out
whenever a station roams to another Access Point (AP) from
this AP. The notification shall include the MAC address of
the station and the IP address of the new AP.

event.Summary: Station $v1 has roamed from this access point to $v2 access point

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: This value indicates the IP address of the Access Point
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11IpAddress

description: The IAPP Context Data Sent notification shall be sent out
whenever the context data for a station has been sent to
the new AP with which the station has associated. The
notification shall include the MAC address of
the station and the IP address of the new AP.

event.Summary: Context data has been sent to $v2 AP with its associated station

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station

description: This value indicates the IP address of the Access Point
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11IpAddress

description: The sntpServerFail notification shall be sent when the AP
fails to get time from the configured SNTP server.

event.Summary: AP failed to get time from the configured SNTP server

description: The InterfaceAFail notification shall be sent out when
802.11a wireless interface has failed.

event.Summary: 802.11a wireless interface failed

description: The InterfaceGFail notification shall be sent out when
802.11g wireless interface has failed.

event.Summary: 802.11g wireless interface failed

description: The WirelessSTPDetection notification shall be sent out when
wireless STP packet has detected.

event.Summary: Detected wireless STP packet

description: This attribute holds the MAC address of the wireless station
variables.name: CTRON-AP3000-MIB::apNotificationDot11Station
